post.alt_text: A sample image that displays the homepage of the website created for ISA.
post.description: ISA hired us to create their whole brand identity. We were hired to design their Logo, Business Cards, Presentation Folders and their Website. The website was created using Angular 6.

post.alt_text: A sample image that displays the homepage of the website created for Sacred Light Healing Centre.
post.description: Sacred Light Healing Centre asked us to design a website to promote their alternative healing solutions. Their main focus was search engine optimization so we recommended a traditional website to improve their ranking on google. We were also hired to revise and convert their logo to a vector format.

post.alt_text: A sample image that displays the homepage of the website created for Triple C Automotive.
post.description: Triple C Automotive was looking to provide their clients with an easy and quick user experience. Technologies that were utlizied were Laravel and Vue.js to build a quick and modern feel.
